sources.title: Cheyenne Rides Again (1937) TOM TYLERüçï COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Tom Tyler, Lucile Browne, Lon Chaney Jr.
Director: Robert F. Hill

Saddle up for action, deception, and Old West justice in this thrilling 1937 Classic Western, starring legendary cowboy star Tom Tyler, with standout performances from Lucile Browne and Carmen Laroux. Directed by Robert F. Hill, this vintage frontier tale combines undercover intrigue with high-stakes drama on the range.

A determined lawman takes a bold risk‚Äîposing as an outlaw and stealing $10,000 from a notorious cattle thief. His goal? To infiltrate the gang and bring the entire criminal operation to justice from the inside. But the deeper he goes, the more dangerous the game becomes. Can he expose the truth before his cover is blown?

This fast-paced Western is packed with classic shootouts, horseback chases, and the kind of rugged heroism fans of Tom Tyler Westerns know and love. With powerful direction from Robert F. Hill, and a dynamic supporting cast featuring Lon Chaney Jr., this film is a must-see for any collector of Cowboy Westerns and lovers of 1930s cinema.

sources.title: Cheyenne Rides Again (1937) Directed by Robert F. Hill | with Tom Tyler, Lon Chaney Jr.
sources.description:
Cattlemen send Cheyenne Tommy Wade undercover to infiltrate Girard's cattle rustling gang. Wade cracks the crew wide open, leading to a wild showdown where dust flies and justice kicks in!

Cheyenne Rides Again (1937) also known as: The Mysterious Bandit

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/6xzUq4uOd2Y


Director: Robert F. Hill
Writer: Basil Dickey
Stars: Tom Tyler, Lon Chaney Jr, Lucile Browne, Carmen Laroux

Genres: Drama, Western, Romance
Release date: January 1, 1937
Filming locations: Iverson Ranch

metadata.Plot: A lawman poses as an outlaw, steals $10,000 from a cattle thief, then promises to return the money if he can join the gang--while finding a way to expose them.
metadata.Actors: Tom Tyler, Lucile Browne, Carmen Laroux
